context: These first European HDTV broadcasts used the <a0_0><b5_0>1080i format<b5_0/><a0_0/> with <a1_0><b6_0>MPEG-2<b6_0/><a1_0/> compression on a <a2_0><b7_0>DVB-S<b7_0/><a2_0/> signal from SES's Astra 1H satellite.
